resources.string:
This application serves as a practice exam to help anyone who are about to take the Zend PHP Certification. A total of 900+ questions are available, ranging from topics in PHP5 to PHP7.1.


	Since this is a free version, this application contains ads. The first set of 150 questions are already available, but the remaining 750 must be unlocked by watching ads from the main menu. Watching a video unlocks 15 questions. You may keep watching until you unlock all 900 questions.


	If you wish to unlock all questions and remove all ads in this application, you may purchase the paid version of the app


	Just like the real exam, questions are always provided in random order, so that when re-taking the exam, a different set of questions are provided for you. Answer options are also randomised to make sure you understand the correct answer rather than the order of answers during the next time you see the question again.


	We believe, from our experience, that one of the most effective ways to increase the chances of passing the exam is to learn from your mistakes in practice exams, just like this one! But your best friend for this will always be php.net.
